column1: The Aragarças Microregion is a geographical division in Goiás state
column2: Brazil.  It consists of 7 municipalities located around Aragarças in western Goiás.

column1: The microregion consists of the following municipalities:
The most populous municipality is Aragarças with 17
column2: 156 inhabitants and the least populous is Diorama with 2
column3: 236 inhabitants. The largest municipality in area is Montes Claros de Goiás with 2
column4: 909.4 km² and the smallest is Diorama with 689.6 km².
